mapper.insert: insert into TBL_SHAREHOUSE_POST (POST_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, IS_UPDATED, CONTENT, ADDRESS, LIKE_CNT) values (seq_sharehouse_post_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'N', #{content}, '서울 성북구 아리랑로 6', 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select ROWNUM post_rownum, POST_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, IS_UPDATED, CONTENT, ADDRESS, LIKE_CNT from (SELECT * FROM TBL_SHAREHOUSE_POST ORDER BY UPDATED_AT desc, post_no desc)) WHERE post_rownum BETWEEN #{pageSize} * (#{page} - 1) + 1 AND #{pageSize} * #{page}
SELECT count(*) FROM TBL_SHAREHOUSE_LIKE where post_no = #{postNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
